page.title: 03The games children play
page.content: This game is called {Kingy.}All the players(any number)stand in a ring with their legs apart.One boy is king, one girl is queen and another player is jack.The king bounces the ball into the middle of the circle and whoever's legs it goes through is the player who is "on".All the others quickly run away while the person who is "on" bounces the ball ten times.Then he/she tries to hit any person with the ball. When someone is hit they are also "on" and can help to eliminate the others. The players who are not "on" cannot hold the ball with their hands but can hit it with their fists.
